articles.title: Covid-19: African Union drops AstraZeneca from its vaccine plan - News24
articles.description:
The African Union's disease control body said on Thursday it has dropped plans to secure
AstraZeneca vaccines for its members.
articles.content:
• The African Union has dropped the AstraZeneca vaccine from its procurement plans.
  • This comes after medicine regulators in Europe said there were possible links between the vaccine and… [+3699 chars]

articles.title: An Eskom deal worth billions was won by making payments to the ANC: report - BusinessTech
